name: Mickey Rooney
spouse: Ava Gardner  (1942–43; divorced)  , B.J. Baker  (1944–48; divorced)  , Martha Vickers  (1949–51; divorced)  , Elaine Devry  (1952–58; divorced)  , Carolyn Mitchell  (1958–66; her death)  , Marge Lane  (1966–67; divorced)  , Carolyn Hockett  (1969–75; divorced)  , Jan Rooney
awards: Academy Juvenile Award, Academy Honorary Award, Academy Award, 2 Golden Globe Awards, Emmy Award
